QuestData.Title: In Battle's Shadow
QuestData.Description: Niuzao's appearance on the battlefield is a blessing... in more ways than one.$b$bWith the distraction that he's caused, our stonemasons have seized the opportunity to build up our crumbling walls. They could use your help.$b$bToss any loose bricks you find up their way. And hurry! Niuzao will not rampage forever.
QuestData.LogDescription: Throw 10 Loose Stones up to Niuzao Stonemasons.
